scripts.tauri:reset: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const os=require('os');const id='com.prompt-mixer.app';const platform=process.platform;const home=os.homedir();const appData=platform==='win32'?(process.env.APPDATA||path.join(home,'AppData','Roaming')):platform==='darwin'?path.join(home,'Library','Application Support'):(process.env.XDG_DATA_HOME||path.join(home,'.local','share'));const dir=path.join(appData,id);const files=['prompt_mixer.db','credentials.json'];for(const f of files){const p=path.join(dir,f);if(fs.existsSync(p)){fs.rmSync(p,{force:true});console.log('removed',p);}else{console.log('missing',p);}}"
